bibl.title: The Documents from the Bar Kokhba Period in the Cave of Letters. Greek Papyri. Aramaic and Nabatean Signatures and Subscriptions, edited by Yigael Yadin and Jonas C. Greenfield. (Judean Desert Studies.)
bibl.note: P. Yadin I, 5; 11-35; 37 [Nos 1-4, 6-10 and 36 (Aramaic and Nabatean) will appear in Volume II]. - The Babatha archive (94-132 AD).
bibl.seg: Lewis Naphtali (edited by), The Documents from the Bar Kokhba Period in the Cave of Letters. Greek Papyri. Aramaic and Nabatean Signatures and Subscriptions, edited by Yigael Yadin and Jonas C. Greenfield. (Judean Desert Studies.)
Jerusalem, Israel Exploration Society - The Hebrew University - The Shrine of the Book, 1989, 4°, xii-164 pp., 1 portrait et 40 pll.
P. Yadin I, 5; 11-35; 37 [Nos 1-4, 6-10 and 36 (Aramaic and Nabatean) will appear in Volume II]. - The Babatha archive (94-132 AD).
C.R. par Benjamin Isaac, IEJ 42 (1992) pp. 62-75. - James G. Keenan, BASP 27 (1990) pp. 69-75. - Alain Martin, Latomus 51 (1992) pp. 198-200. - Margarete Schlüter, Gnomon 63 (1991) pp. 708-712.
